import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { DataContext } from '../pages/_app' import Image from './Image' import CountBar from './CountBar' const Fifa = () => { const { labels, fifa } = useContext(DataContext); const { copy, image, minutesCount, gamesCount, goalsCount } = fifa return (
{ labels.fifaWorldCup } 2019
{ labels.statistics }

{ copy }

) } export default Fifa;
